record.description: Signing of the contract for the sale of the John Crerar Library Building to the George F. Harding Museum in Crerar Librarian's office, 2:30 p.m., Wednesday, June 28, 1961. Standing left to right: Raymond Donnersberger, real estate broker for the Harding Museum, G. H. Scriber Jr., J. A. Sheckler, and Kenneth G. Leigh, and George R. Bailey, real estate brokers for Crerar Library. Seated left to right: Herman M. Silverstein, vice-president of the George F. Harding Museum and H. P. Sedwick, President of the John Crerar Library.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
